course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Writer's Workshop
class_notes:
Students will hone their research and writing skills around a number of nonfictional genres: film criticism, personal essay, opinion, scholarly article, online writing, and multimedia formats such as podcast and video essay. Students will develop their own independent film/media-related research topics and participate in writing workshops, games, and activities.


Additional Prereq of FILM 102, please reach out to Ale Perozo Borges (alejandra.perozo@emory.edu) with your 7-digit ID for a permission number.
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3496, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: T. Allison, Status: Open
